interventions.name: Vaccination
interventions.notes: Each day, vaccination directly moves a fixed number of people from susceptible compartment to vaccinated compartment. The number of people vaccinated is determined by the product of 'degree' and 'max_capacity'. Hence, when the 'degree' is 100%, 'max_capacity' people are vaccinated.

control_params.name: degree
control_params.description: 0% means no vaccination at all while 100% achieves the max_capacity per day

control_params.name: max_capacity
control_params.description: Maximum number of people vaccinated per day if 100% degree is reached

control_params.name: price_per_dose
control_params.description: Price per dose (or 2-dose if the vaccine requires 2 doses)

interventions.name: Masks
interventions.notes: Mask reduces the transmission rate in all facilities except Household (since people do not where mask in household). Mask is modeled by two control parameters 'compliance' and 'max_transmission_reduction'. At 100% 'compliance', there will be a 'max_transmission_reduction' to the transmission rate in all facilities except Household.

control_params.name: max_transmission_reduction
control_params.description: Maximum percentage of reduction for transmission rate when there is 100% compliance

interventions.name: School closure

control_params.name: percentage
control_params.description: The percentage of students being remote

control_params.name: cost_per_day
control_params.description: Economic cost of affecting one student per day

interventions.name: Workplace closure

costs.name: Infection_Cost
costs.notes: At each day, there will be a cost incurred for each infectious person

control_params.name: cost_per_day
control_params.description: Cost of infection per person per day

facilities.name: Household
facilities.description: The household facility represents the pairwise connections between household members. Unlike schools and workplaces, everyone must be assigned to a household.

facilities.name: School
facilities.description: The school facility represents all of the pairwise connections between people in schools, including both students and teachers. The current methods in SynthPops treat student and worker status as mutually exclusive.

facilities.name: Workplace
facilities.description: The workplace facility represents all of the pairwise connections between people in workplaces, except for teachers working in schools. After some workers are assigned to the school contact layer as teachers, all remaining workers are assigned to workplaces. Workplaces are special in that there is little/no age structure so workers of all ages may be present in every workplace.

facilities.name: Community
facilities.description: The community facility reflects the nature of contacts in shared public spaces like parks and recreational spaces, shopping centres, community centres, and public transportation. All links between individuals are considered undirected to reflect the ability of either individual in the pair to infect each other.
